Fields.Name: Delta X
Fields.Description: Delta shift in X axis from WGS 84

Fields.Name: Delta Y
Fields.Description: Delta shift in Y axis from WGS 84

Fields.Name: Delta Z
Fields.Description: Delta shift in Z axis from WGS 84

Fields.Name: Rotation in X
Fields.Description: Rotational shift in X axis from WGS 84. Rotations presented use the geodetic sign convention.  When looking along the positive axis towards the origin, counter-clockwise rotations are positive.

Fields.Name: Rotation in Y
Fields.Description: Rotational shift in Y axis from WGS 84. Rotations presented use the geodetic sign convention.  When looking along the positive axis towards the origin, counter-clockwise rotations are positive.

Fields.Name: Rotation in Z
Fields.Description: Rotational shift in Z axis from WGS 84. Rotations presented use the geodetic sign convention.  When looking along the positive axis towards the origin, counter-clockwise rotations are positive.

Fields.Name: Ellipsoid Semi-major Axis
Fields.Description: Semi-major axis (a) of the User Datum ellipsoid

Fields.Name: Ellipsoid Flattening Inverse
Fields.Description: Flattening (1/f) of the User Datum ellipsoid

Fields.Name: Datum Name
Fields.Description: 4 character code from IHO Publication S-60,Appendices B and C. First three chars are datum ID as per IHO tables. Fourth char is local datum subdivision code.
